message_1: Suppose a Vigenere cipher with a keyword "MATH" is used to encrypt the message "ATTACKATDAWN". If the ciphertext generated is "MPUCAAWKTFWV", what is the original message before encryption?
message_2:
To decrypt the message, we will use the Vigenere cipher decryption process. We will subtract the keyword letters from the ciphertext letters (mod 26) to get the original message.

Ciphertext: MPUCAAWKTFWV
Keyword:    MATHMATHMATH

1. M (12) - M (12) = A (0)
2. P (15) - A (0) = P (15)
3. U (20) - T (19) = T (1)
4. C (2) - H (7) = A (26 - 5 = 21)
5. A (0) - M (12) = T (26 - 12 = 14)
6. A (0) - A (0) = A (0)
7. W (22) - T (19) = C (3)
8. K (10) - H (7) = A (3)
9. T (19) - M (12) = T (7)
10. F (5) - A (0) = F (5)
11. W (22) - T (19) = W (3)
12. V (21) - H (7) = N (14)

The decrypted message is "ATTACKATDAWN".
